newsitem.title: CHINA: New York Life, Principal target HK's pension fund.
newsitem.headline: New York Life, Principal target HK's pension fund.

text.p: New York Life Insurance Worldwide Ltd and Principal Insurance company (Hong Kong) Ltd on Tuesday said they have formed a strategic alliance to launch a new insurance product in anticipation of the start-up of the Mandatory Provident Fund (MPF).
The Hong Kong government said on Monday that it hoped the MPF, a type of public pension plan, as soon as preparatory work is completed by the end of next year.
The new Harvest Employee Benefit Scheme has been specifically designed to cater to companies with two to 50 employees, which make up 80 percent of Hong Kong businesses.

"We believe this is the first strategic alliance formed between two Hong Kong life insurance companies to target the future MPF market," Stanley Silberstein, president of New York Life, said in a statement.
